      • getParameters

        public Map<String,​String> getParameters()
        Description copied from interface: StepParameterPojo
        Transforms an object to a map of step parameters and their values. It uses fields of type that extends StepParameterPojo or fields annotated by StepParameter
        Specified by:
        getParameters in interface StepParameterPojo
        Returns:
        a map where key is a name of a parameter and value is a value of a parameter
